Supplier Criteria

Does the training provider have relevant experience/reputation in the food,
packaging, or manufacturing industry?

Are the facilitators qualified in adult education or training methodologies?
Are training materials aligned with current legislative and industry standards (e.g.,
BRCGS, GFSI,  local regulations)?

Is the provider able to deliver training in appropriate languages?
Auditing?
Does the provider have a structured process for evaluating training effectiveness
(e.g., trainee feedback, post-training assessments)?

Does the provider issue attendance certificates or training records?

Supplier Agreement

As part of our Management System, Kangopak requires the following minimum service expectations from training
providers:
Provide qualified facilitators with experience in food packaging, manufacturing, and applicable quality standards.
Deliver training aligned with our documented procedures, compliance requirements, and adult learning principles.
Submit training records, including:
Participant attendance list
Feedback summaries
Copies of issued certificates

I .................................................................. , as the representative of this supplier, hereby declare the above
information to be accurate and I agree to supply Kangopak with all required documentation.
